multiple_choice.question: Where did Anansi and the Rabbit live?
What did Anansi fill in the big basket?
In the end, who got the farm?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Rabbit owned a big farm with lots of vegetables and fruit
Anansi saw Vulture sitting on his basket
Anansi happily headed home with his basket on his head
